identity.name: SafestPath
identity.description: A tactical safety tool for women that feels like a futuristic guardian, not a panic button. Dark mode by default to reduce screen glare at night.

typography.instructions: Use Space Grotesk for all headings to give a 'Command Center' feel. Use Manrope for all UI text for maximum legibility.

usage.primary: Use Electric Teal (#2DD4BF) for 'Safe' routes, primary actions, and active states.
usage.destructive: Use Signal Orange (#F97316) for 'Danger' zones, SOS buttons, and critical alerts.
usage.background: Deep Navy (#020617) is the canvas. Never use pure black.

layout.spacing: Generous. Use p-6 or p-8 for containers.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 shadow-[0_0_20px_-5px_rgba(45,212,191,0.5)] rounded-full font-bold tracking-wide transition-all hover:scale-105
buttons.destructive: bg-destructive text-white hover:bg-destructive/90 shadow-[0_0_20px_-5px_rgba(249,115,22,0.5)] rounded-full font-bold uppercase tracking-widest animate-pulse

cards.style: bg-slate-900/50 backdrop-blur-md border border-white/10 rounded-xl shadow-2xl

inputs.style: bg-slate-950/50 border-white/10 focus:border-primary focus:ring-primary/20 rounded-lg h-12

map_markers.safe: Teal glowing dot with shield icon
map_markers.danger: Orange pulsing ring with alert icon
map_markers.user: White solid circle with radar ripple effect

visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use heavily for map overlays (search bar, route details). Class: 'bg-background/80 backdrop-blur-xl border-b border-white/5'
visual_enhancers.gradients: Use subtle radial gradients in the background to highlight key areas. 'bg-[radial-gradient(ellipse_at_top,_var(--tw-gradient-stops))] from-teal-900/20 via-background to-background'
visual_enhancers.borders: 1px solid white/10 for structure. No thick borders.

instructions_to_main_agent.general: You are building a 'Nocturnal Guardian' safety app. It must look like a high-tech tool, not a social media app. Prioritize map visibility.
instructions_to_main_agent.theme_setup: IMMEDIATELY update /app/frontend/src/index.css with the provided shadcn_variables. Ensure 'dark' class is applied to the html/body by default.
instructions_to_main_agent.map_integration: Use 'react-leaflet'. Style the map tiles to be dark/night mode (use CartoDB Dark Matter tiles if possible).
instructions_to_main_agent.sos_button: The SOS button must be always visible on the map screen, preferably floating bottom-right or fixed in the nav. Make it RED/ORANGE and PULSING.
instructions_to_main_agent.route_display: When showing routes, use color coding: Teal for Safe, Grey for Shortest. Show the 'Safety Score' prominently.
instructions_to_main_agent.testing: Add data-testid to all interactive elements (e.g., 'sos-button', 'route-search-input').

UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
